Thank you Bjarne for your reply!

I have downloaded and decompressed the=
 WayBack and TomCat application in separate folders.

The WayBack website s=
tates the following steps to install the WayBack program:

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<=
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

Installing Waybac=
k
Once you have downloaded the .tar.gz file from sourceforge, you will need=
 to unpack the file to access the webapp file, wayback-webapp-1.6.0.war. 
I=
nstallation and configuration of this software involves the following steps=
: 
1.	Placing .war file in appropriate location. 
2.	Waiting for Tomcat to =
unpack the .war file. 
3.	Customizing base wayback.xml and possibly other X=
ML configuration files. 
4.	Restarting tomcat. 

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>=
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>


Now I have the following q=
uestions:

1)	Where should I put the WayBack .WAR file?
2)	How do I start T=
omCat?  (I have already installed Java on my Windows OS)
3)	How do I use To=
mCat to unpack the .WAR file?


This group is REALLY HELPFUL, I thank you a=
ll!

Itamar
